python_colors package¶

Submodules¶

python_colors.cli module¶

Console script for python_colors.

python_colors.colors module¶

Main module.

class python_colors.colors.Coloring[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for print colored text on UNIX terminals on a easy way, available colors are: BLACK, RED, GREEN, YELLOW, BLUE, PURPLE, CYAN, WHITE

classmethod colored_text(text, color)[source]¶
colors = {'BLACK': '\x1b[90m', 'BLUE': '\x1b[94m', 'CYAN': '\x1b[96m', 'GREEN': '\x1b[92m', 'PURPLE': '\x1b[95m', 'RED': '\x1b[91m', 'WHITE': '\x1b[97m', 'YELLOW': '\x1b[93m'}¶
